text: La Jura is an Italian opera in five acts, with music and libretto by Gavino Gabriel. It was first performed in Cagliari, in 1928. On April 8, 1958 it was performed in Naples. ==Principal characters== * Jaconi - tenor * Pasca - soprano * Anghilesa - mezzo-soprano * Bur√©dda - baritone * Filianu - bass * Matalena - mezzo-soprano == References == Category:1920s operas Category:1928 works
title: La Jura
